section.title: Known Issues
section.para: The following are the defects currently used to track known issues in the Alpha.1 release. Click a link below for more information:

para.link: DE626: Better exception handling for a few cases
DE1313: SLC Operator has knowledge of new super admin users' passwords

section.title: DE626: Better exception handling for a few cases
section.para: Some logged errors may not properly reflect the severity of issues.

section.title: DE1313: SLC Operator has knowledge of new super admin users' passwords

}.rally-rte-class-0b90b24b{box-sizing: border-box; }Operator steps:1.Add a property to the admin sli.properties properties sli.api.ldap.user sli.api.ldap.passThe values for the properties should be the ldap username and password.
